comments:
In the launch configuration dialog, mutiple launch configurations can be
selected,  and the debug button is enabled. However, when click debug button,
none of selected lauch configurations is started. 

Suggestion:
Either disenable multiple selection in the left tree view 
or allow multiple launch the selections.

NPE is thrown as a result of this:
